title: Rebrand site to “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER” across UI, metadata, and logo assets

requirements.summary: Replace all visible UI occurrences of the old training center name with “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER”.
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text shows exactly “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER”.
Hero H1 shows exactly “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER”.
Footer training center name shows exactly “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER” in all occurrences.
No remaining occurrences of “Bidhathi” remain in user-visible page text.

file_operations.description: Update the header brand text to exactly “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER” and ensure no user-visible “Bidhathi” remains.

Update hero H1 and all footer occurrences (including copyright line) to exactly “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER”, and update any related user-visible strings/alt text to remove “Bidhathi”.

requirements.summary: Update SEO and sharing metadata to use the new training center name in English across title and social tags.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML <title> includes “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER”.
og:title and twitter:title are updated to “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER”.
No metadata fields contain the old name.

file_operations.description: Replace old-name occurrences in SEO metadata with “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER”, including <title>, meta description text where it includes the old name, og:title, and twitter:title; keep all metadata user-facing text in English.

requirements.summary: Add updated logo and favicon assets containing the new brand name and update all logo/favicon references across the site and social preview metadata.
acceptanceCriteria: A new generated logo asset containing the text “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER” is added under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Header and hero logo tags reference the new logo filename.
The social preview image metadata (og:image and twitter:image) references the updated logo asset (or another updated brand asset) and no longer points to an outdated logo containing the old name.

file_operations.description: Add the regenerated brand logo image that includes the text “MINAKHAN SKILL DEVELOPMENT TRAINING CENTER” (per imageRequirements edit).
Add the updated favicon matching the new logo styling (per imageRequirements edit).
Update the header logo src to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/training-center-logo-minakhan.dim_512x512.png and adjust alt text if needed to reflect the new branding.
Update the hero logo src to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/training-center-logo-minakhan.dim_512x512.png and ensure alt text reflects the new branding (remove any old-name mentions).

Update favicon link to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-minakhan.dim_64x64.png, and update og:image and twitter:image to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/training-center-logo-minakhan.dim_512x512.png so social previews no longer use the outdated logo.
